title: Can we say Good luck or Best of luck? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: can I say good luck or best of luck to my friends and family or will it exclude me from among the 70,000 Muslims and which is the best alternative Islam you want to make Dua for them the best of luck or asking them to wish you good luck no I just for example as a greeting and they have like exams or something and say to my friend like best of luck no no problem no problem in that inshallah there's no problem in saying that
